description: A 5-year-old boy remained in critical condition Thursday morning after being found unconscious in a swimming pool earlier in the week, Clayton County police said.
title: Boy remains critical after near drowning in Clayton
title_page: 5-year-old in critical condition after nearly drowning
text:
A 5-year-old boy remained in critical condition Thursday morning after being found unconscious in a swimming pool earlier in the week, Clayton County police said.
The near drowning happened just before 8 p.m. Tuesday at an apartment complex in the 6500 block of Mount Zion Road.
The first officer on the scene assisted a man who was already performing CPR on the boy, Officer Ashanti Marbury said in a news release.
Emergency responders transported the boy to a hospital in critical condition, she said.
Marbury said Thursday that the boyâ€™s condition was unchanged.
Police are investigating the incident.
